credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Tanzstudio Wulff. Relache, Parade, Ariadne
provenance: Reinhold Brown Gallery, New York, NY
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
description: A mixture of different type fonts arranged on a diagonal opposition with rectilinear text blocks. Printed in "split-fountain" which produces color transitions from red at top left, through orange, yellow to green, blue, lavender and violet at bottom right corner. The date is printed in black at top center.
name: Poster
